questions.question: What does AI stand for?
questions.explanation: AI stands for Artificial Intelligence - computers that can do smart things like answer questions and help with tasks!

questions.question: Which of these is something AI can help you do?
questions.explanation: AI can help you write stories! It can suggest ideas and help with spelling and grammar.

questions.question: Is everything AI tells you always correct?
questions.explanation: AI can make mistakes! That's why it's important to check important information with a grown-up or another source.

questions.question: What should you do before using AI for homework?
options: Ask a teacher or parent first
questions.explanation: Always ask a teacher or parent before using AI for homework. They can help you use it the right way!

questions.question: What is a 'prompt'?
options: A question or instruction you give to AI
questions.explanation: A prompt is like asking AI a question or giving it instructions. The better your question, the better the answer!

questions.question: Which helper is an example of AI?
questions.explanation: Siri and Alexa are AI helpers! They can answer questions and do things when you ask them.

questions.question: Can AI draw pictures?
options: Yes, some AI can create images
questions.explanation: Some AI can create amazing pictures! You describe what you want, and the AI draws it for you.

questions.question: What should you NEVER share with AI?
options: What you want to learn about
questions.explanation: Never share personal information like your full name, address, or school with AI. Keep that private!

questions.question: How does AI learn?
options: By reading lots of text and finding patterns
questions.explanation: AI learns by reading billions of words and finding patterns. It's like learning to recognize patterns in puzzles!

questions.question: If AI gives you an answer you're not sure about, what should you do?
options: Check with a trusted adult or book
questions.explanation: When you're not sure about an AI answer, check with a trusted adult, teacher, or look it up in a book!

questions.question: Can AI read your mind?
options: No, you have to tell it what you want
questions.explanation: AI cannot read minds! You need to tell it clearly what you want help with.

questions.question: What makes a good question for AI?
options: A very short question with no details
A clear question with helpful details
questions.explanation: Good AI questions are clear and have details. Instead of 'help with homework,' try 'help me understand why leaves change color.'

questions.question: Is AI the same as a robot?
options: No, AI is the 'brain' and robots are machines
AI is a type of food
questions.explanation: AI is like a smart brain that can think. A robot is a machine that can move. Some robots have AI brains!

questions.question: Why is it important to be nice when talking to AI?
options: Being polite helps you practice good habits
questions.explanation: Being polite to AI helps you practice good communication habits, even though AI doesn't have feelings.

questions.question: Can AI do your thinking for you?
options: Yes, you never need to think again
No, AI helps but you still need to think
questions.explanation: AI is a helper, not a replacement for your own thinking! Your ideas and creativity are still super important.

questions.question: What can ChatGPT and Claude help you with?
questions.explanation: ChatGPT and Claude are AI that help with writing, answering questions, and explaining things.

questions.question: If you copy AI's answer exactly for homework, is that okay?
options: No, you should use your own words and ideas
Only if no one finds out
questions.explanation: Copying AI word-for-word isn't your own work. Use AI to help you understand, then write in your own words!

questions.question: What does it mean when we say AI can 'hallucinate'?
options: AI can see things that aren't there
AI sometimes makes up incorrect information
questions.explanation: When AI 'hallucinates,' it means it might confidently say something that isn't true. Always double-check important facts!

questions.question: Which is a good way to use AI?
options: Let it do all your work
Use it as a helper and learning tool
Use it only to play games
questions.explanation: AI is best used as a helper and learning tool. It can explain things, give ideas, and help you learn!

questions.question: Can AI feel happy or sad?
questions.explanation: AI doesn't have feelings like people do. It might use words about feelings, but it doesn't actually experience them.

questions.question: What's the best thing about AI?
options: It can help you learn and be creative
questions.explanation: AI is great for helping you learn new things and sparking creativity! But it works best alongside teachers and parents.

questions.question: How is AI different from a search engine like Google?
options: AI can create new text, not just find existing pages
questions.explanation: Search engines find existing web pages. AI can create new text, like writing a story or explaining something in different ways.

questions.question: What's a 'chatbot'?
options: A robot that chats in person
An AI you can have a conversation with by typing
questions.explanation: A chatbot is an AI you can have conversations with by typing messages. ChatGPT and Claude are chatbots!

questions.question: Who makes AI?
options: People who work as computer scientists and engineers
questions.explanation: People called computer scientists and engineers create AI. They write special instructions called code.

questions.question: If AI helps you with a school project, should you tell your teacher?
options: Yes, it's important to be honest
questions.explanation: Being honest is important! Tell your teacher if AI helped you. Many teachers want to know so they can guide you.

questions.question: What happens when lots of people ask AI the same question?
options: AI might give different answers each time
questions.explanation: AI can give slightly different answers each time, even for the same question! That's part of how it works.

questions.question: Can AI help you learn a new language?
options: Yes, AI can help practice languages
questions.explanation: AI can help you practice many languages! It can translate, explain grammar, and help you learn new words.

questions.question: Why do we say AI is a 'tool'?
options: Because it looks like a hammer
Because it helps us do things, like other tools help us
Because you can buy it at a hardware store
questions.explanation: Just like a hammer helps build things, AI is a tool that helps us write, learn, and solve problems!

questions.question: What should you do if AI says something mean or wrong?
options: Tell a trusted adult and don't use that information
Keep asking until it says something nice
questions.explanation: If AI says something wrong or unkind, don't use that information. Tell a trusted adult so they can help.

questions.question: Is AI getting smarter over time?
options: No, AI stays the same forever
questions.explanation: AI keeps getting better because people keep working to improve it! That's why it's important to keep learning about it.
